trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Amherst
There were no other sightings in Amherst on or around September 6th 2008
Summary: Red UFO's in sky flying together.
divs: Sighting DetailsWell...I was out with some friends around 9.pm then I looked up at the sky and saw three red lights flying by.. they couldn't have been airplanes because of their speed and they were flying kinda low. I saw them flying by for a few minutes. Since I was just sitting in the passenger seat I couldn't really stop and look. I tried taking pictures of the lights with my cellphone but since in the moving car and they weren't so close it would come out too blurry. Well my friend just kept driving.. so eventually i just lost sight of it.
